text: Approval for the acs multi-link rx and otw ultra(tm) coronary stent systems.  The devices are indicated for improving coronary lumen diameter in the following: 1) patients with syntomatic ischemic disease due to discrete de novo or restenotic native coronary artery lesions (length <= 25 mm) with a reference vessel diameter of 3.5 mm to 5.0 mm; and 2) treatment of abrupt or threatened abrupt closure in patients with failed interventional therapy in lesions (<= 35 mm in length) with reference diameters in the range of 3.5 mm to 5.0 mm.  Long term outcome for this permanent implant is unknown at present. note:  the 38 mm length stents are solely indicated for use in patients with abrupt or threatened abrupt closure.
